caption.p:
Comparison of acute alcoholism in mice: the liver SOD and MDA levels among groups. (a) SOD; (b) MDA. Control: the group without alcohol or any drugs. Model: the group cured with alcohol only. RU-21: the positive control group cured with RU-21 before alcohol. CTR: the experiment group cured with the CTR before alcohol. ▲ p < 0.05 compared with the control group and
∗
p < 0.05 compared with the model group.
